stimulusHtml: Based on the graph, which of the following concepts is being demonstrated by the evaluators?

features.html:
Dr. Diamond collects data from employee evaluations at Company ABC, which is investigating why accidents occur in the workplace. She groups the evaluators’ comments into two categories and determines that the evaluators used either a situational or a dispositional attribution in their evaluations. Her findings are represented in the graph. 

Evaluators’ Attributions

  • The Number of Evaluator Comments data for the 2 bars are as follows:
    • Situational Attributions: 2
    • Dispositional Attributions: 10
